properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Cape Mendocino to Pt. Arena CA out 10 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 19 at 9:08PM PST until January 21 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Eureka CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Seas around 9 feet 13 seconds tonight through Monday
afternoon. South winds increasing Monday evening and overnight,
reaching 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 35 kt, with seas building
to 11 to 14 feet 10 seconds.

* WHERE...Cape Mendocino to Pt Arena out 10 nm.

* WHEN...For the first Small Craft Advisory, until 3 AM PST
Monday. For the Small Craft Advisory, from 5 PM Monday to 8 AM
PST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...An additional very large swell will also
arrive Tuesday, after winds subside.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PST MONDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM MONDAY TO 8 AM PST TUESDAY
